snippet.title: ENIGMA: Opening Video, "Theme of ENIGMA"
snippet.description:
English version of "Theme of ENIGMA", opening for mystery visual novel ENIGMA:

Lyrics by Soki (Mikatuki)
Composed by Shiro (Sumizone Sound)
Vocals by mineko of MN-logic24 

Now available on Steam!
http://store.steampowered.com/app/494100

Developed by Uzumeya, localized by Fruitbat Factory. 
http://fruitbatfactory.com
